rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, baby. You're looking good.
That smile's worth a million G.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0002
rows.name:
What? Are you talking to me?
What a creep...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0003
rows.name: Aw, don't be like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0004
rows.name:
Although, I kinda dig it
when you call me names...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0005
rows.name: Leave me alone!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0006
rows.name: ...Ugh.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0007
rows.name: Oi. Cut it out, Sata.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0008
rows.name:
What, Benkei? Why you gotta
butt in on my moment of sweet bliss?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0009
rows.name:
Sweet? Oh please.
She looked ready to barf.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0010
rows.name: You sweet, naive girl.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0011
rows.name:
She was just playing hard to get!
Girls are cute like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0012
rows.name:
...There's no helping your
sick brain any more, is there.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0013
rows.name:
Did you come all this way just to
bother innocent women?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0014
rows.name: But of course. What about it?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0015
rows.name:
I've heard this store is popular with
the ladies.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0016
rows.name: Ohhhhhh boy...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0017
rows.name:
Now, listen. This is an important part
of my quest for self-improvement.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0018
rows.name:
This? So you're improving yourself
to be an even bigger perv.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0019
rows.name: No no no, Benkei.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0020
rows.name:
You know what makes a good man?
A little attention from a good woman,
that's what.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0021
rows.name:
Those ones aren't even giving you
the time of day, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0022
rows.name: Urk...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0023
rows.name:
Come on, Driver, back me up here!
You think I'm a good man, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0024
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0025
rows.name: Yeah, you're a good man.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0026
rows.name: Um...not really.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0027
rows.name: What do I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0028
rows.name: Sure, why not. You're all right.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0029
rows.name: Um, how about no.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0030
rows.name: How shall I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0031
rows.name: I think you're just fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0032
rows.name: I think not.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0033
rows.name: How do I reply?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0034
rows.name: You're a good bloke.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0035
rows.name: I'd have to say no.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0101
rows.name: See? Some people get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0102
rows.name:
In fact, you've just won my heart.
Let's get married, you and me!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0103
rows.name:
You really will just take about
anyone, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0104
rows.name: That was a joke. Relax.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0105
rows.name:
Seriously though, having a partner
makes all the difference, doesn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0106
rows.name:
I mean, look at Rex - he was just
a salvager, but now? Why, he's
the Holy Grail's Driver!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0107
rows.name:
That's an extreme example...
But yeah, maybe you're not wrong.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0108
rows.name: Right?!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0109
rows.name:
For us Blades, I think it's important
to branch out. Just being buddy-buddy
with our Drivers can only get us so far.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0110
rows.name:
There's plenty of areas where you can
only grow through contact with others,
don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0111
rows.name: Sure, I guess...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0112
rows.name:
I'm so glad we've reached
an understanding, Benkei!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0113
rows.name: ...Uh-huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0114
rows.name: ...Uhh?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0115
rows.name: But, uh...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0116
rows.name: Yeah?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0117
rows.name:
What's that got to do
with you bein' a perv?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0118
rows.name: Ugh, she worked it out?!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0119
rows.name: I'm so done with you!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0120
rows.name: Those two make a nice pair.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0121
rows.name: They're so cute together.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0122
rows.name: They get along so well...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0123
rows.name: Thick as thieves, those two.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0201
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0202
rows.name: Saw it coming.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0203
rows.name:
Driver...my Driver! I trusted you,
and yet you repay me with heartless
words and wound my soul.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0204
rows.name:
Benkei, let me seek comfort
in your tender embrace!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0205
rows.name: Like hell!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0206
rows.name:
Don't you reject me too!
You're basically the only one
I have left here.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0207
rows.name: I told you to piss off!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0208
rows.name: Don't be so stubborn!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0209
rows.name: Who's being stubborn?!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0210
rows.name:
I see.
You still think I'm joking, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0211
rows.name: Well now...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0212
rows.name:
To prove how serious I am...
I will do anything you ask of me!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0213
rows.name:
If you tell me not to pester other girls,
I won't...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0214
rows.name:
And if you tell me to learn to eat
sour pickled plums, well, I'll surely try.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0215
rows.name:
Come on, say it. Anything at all!
My seriousness is on the line.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0216
rows.name:
...All right. Smash your Core Crystal
up then, would you?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0217
rows.name: So harsh!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0218
rows.name: I thought you said you'd do anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0219
rows.name:
Uh, I... That's...
a very...literal reading...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0220
rows.name:
Oh, and here I thought
you were serious about me.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0221
rows.name:
...I...
I'm sorry.
I may have taken it too far.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0222
rows.name: So you admit you were toying with me...

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0223
rows.name:
As punishment, you will be
the party packhorse!

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0224
rows.name:
That should give you time for
self-improvement.

rows.label: kizunatalk048_msg0225
rows.name:
Come on, Benkei...
Pleeeeeaseee...
